Text.text: The HotFolder input channel scans directories for hot files.

CheckBox.text: Activate the HotFolder channel on server startup

Text.text: The current status of the channel is listed below.
Use the links below to execute one of the defined tasks.

Link.text: Restart the input channel and update its configuration

Label.text: : open the Queue Page to manage Queues.

Text.text: Select a queue from the table to edit the parameters or use one of the buttons to Manage the Queues.

CheckBox.text: start this queue on server startup
accept files with zero bytes file size
All found files will be added to the filestatus table.
Parallel access impossible due to lock. Useful on identical configuration on several cluster nodes.

Label.text: Workflow if no file was found.
Workflow to check the correctness of a ticket.
Workflow after a file was accepted.

Text.text: The current status of the current Queue is listed below.
Use the links below to execute one of the defined tasks.

Link.text: Restart the Queue channel and update its configuration
